introduction.p: I have made an account for you on an online homework platform called Edfinity. Visit Edfinity at edfinity.com/registrations.
There is one assignment in Edfinity for (almost) every section we cover in the textbook.

The due dates for each assignment are visible in Edfinity. I do not duplicate them here in case I might make a mistake. But generally when we cover a section on a Tuesday, that Edfinity assignment is due the following Sunday night. And when we cover a section on a Thursday, that Edfinity assignment is due the following Wednesday night.
Edfinity homework sets are collectively worth 9% of your grade. If you miss one, you cannot make it up. When the due date passes, everyone gets access to the answers.
If online homework is too burdensome, please contact me and we can discuss alternative options.
